alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Iron; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 7:34PM CDT until May 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Crawford County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Iron County in southeastern Missouri... Southwestern Washington County in east central Missouri... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Courtois, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Crawford, northwestern Iron and southwestern Washington Counties, including the following locations... Davisville, Belgrade and Caledonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
